title: SPC-720
content:

[[include info:start]]
**SPC-720:** Mom, I Frowed Up
**Author:** [[*user TheMightyMcB]]
**More By This Author:**
* http://www.scp-wiki.net/themightymcb-s-author-page
**Special thanks to:**
[[*user DrBleep]], [[*user Naepic]], and anyone else who may have read this 4 years ago that I can't remember (please message me if that's you)!

[[include info:end]]

**Item #:** SPC-720

**Object Class:** TK/O'd

**Selachian Pugilization Contingencies:** SPC-720 is currently being displayed in the office of Senior Pugilist Chauncy MacGreaves as a reminder of his pugilistic prowess. In the wake of recent events, Junior Pugilists are no longer permitted access to SPC-720. All emissions are to be confiscated and --disposed of-- turned over to Senior Pugilist MacGreaves.

**Description:** SPC-720 is an adult male Bull-Class Selachian Entity[[footnote]]//Carcharhinus leucas//[[/footnote]] that is believed to have a spacial anomaly in lieu of a gastrointestinal system. When pugilized in the abdominal region, SPC-720 will typically forcefully expel an item from its mouth. The nature of these items are highly variable[[footnote]]See Addendum 720-1.[[/footnote]], and prior to recent events, acquisition of an emission was considered an informal rite of passage for all prospective Junior Pugilists.

**Addendum 720-1:** Abridged log of SPC-720 emissions.

[[table  style="border-collapse:collapse; max-width: 1200px;"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="font-weight:bold;padding: .3em .7em; text-align: center; border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver; width: 20%;"]]
Junior Pugilist
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="font-weight:bold; padding: .3em .7em; text-align: center; border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"]]
Emission
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="font-weight:bold; padding: .3em .7em; text-align: center; border: 1px solid black; background-color: silver;"]]
Other Information
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Francis Willikard
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: .3em .7em;"]]
Arkansas License Plate # 639 KDH
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: .3em .7em;"]]
Instance was found mounted inside of Junior Pugilist Willikard's storage locker.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Derek Adams
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: .3em .7em;"]]
Pearl Masterworks Nine Piece Drum Kit
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Adams was found in the Center break room playing a drum solo that has been going on for long enough to make everyone wish the next song would start.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Brian Abernathy
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: .3em .7em;"]]
Sony FDR-AX53 Video Camera
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Turned in to Senior Pugilist MacGreaves by Junior Pugilist Abernathy. The SD card on the camera contained 53 minutes and 12 seconds of selachian coitus. Junior Pugilist Abernathy requested formal amnesia induction treatment, which was denied on account of the Shark Punching Center's recently terminated contract with Louisville Slugger.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Steven O'Brien
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: .3em .7em;"]]
Firestone Destination A/T 33x12.50 Tire
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Instance was found next to an unconscious Junior Pugilist O'Brien. O'Brien has since been dismissed from the Shark Punching Center for being K/O'd by a selachian that had already been defeated.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Thomas DuBois
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: .3em .7em;"]]
Roost-and-Root Walk-In Chicken Coop
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Found locked, containing eight hens, a rooster, and Junior Pugilist DuBois.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Jacob Woodard
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: .3em .7em;"]]
A complete and polished set of plate armor, circa 1500
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Junior Pugilist Woodard has requested to keep the armor, which was denied on the account that we'll look like damn cowards and we aren't damn cowards.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
Taylor Barber
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding: .3em .7em;"]]
RDS-220 Hydrogen Bomb
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: center; padding: .3em .7em; border: 1px solid black"]]
The next person to touch this fucking shark is getting whatever it barfs up next shoved up their ass.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

**Addendum 720-2:** Further Study
Following SCP-720's emission of an RDS-220 Hydrogen Bomb, Shark Punching Center eggheads performed a very fucking lame vivisection of the selachian. Internally, SPC-720 was not found to be different from a non-anomalous member of its species. SPC-720 is currently pending reclassification to "Explained".

**Addendum 720-3:** Cowabunga Committee Mandate
Per a unanimous decision by the Cowabunga Committee, reclassification to "Explained" was denied. In the interest of continued selachian ass-kickin', a reclassification to "Pulverized" is currently ongoing.

[[footnoteblock]]
